title: Create /search-roles slash command
description: Create .claude/commands/search-roles.md that instructs LLM to use WebSearch/WebFetch to find roles, extract org signals, match to orgmap, prompt for orgmap updates on unmapped roles, then call client.save_roles().

title: Test iterative discovery workflow (roles → orgmap → roles)
description: Test both discovery scenarios: (1) /search-roles first creates skeleton orgmap, then /map-org enriches it; (2) /map-org first, then /search-roles discovers new teams and prompts for updates. Verify references stay valid.

title: Update SDK documentation with orgmap and roles APIs
description: Run docs/generate_docs.py to regenerate SDK_REFERENCE.md with new orgmap and role methods. Ensure docstrings include examples and proper documentation.

title: Layer 1.5: Organizational Cartography - Org Mapping & Role Search
description: Add "Organizational Cartography" layer to WCTF framework, enabling discovery of VP orgs (peaks) and Director teams (rope teams), plus role search that maps to org structure. Roles and org mapping inform each other iteratively.

title: Add Pydantic models for orgmap (Peak, RopeTeam, CompanyOrgMap)
description: Add rich Pydantic models to wctf_core/models.py for org mapping: Leadership, OrgMetrics, CoordinationSignals, InsiderConnection, RopeTeam, Peak, CompanyOrgMap. Include validators, helpers, and computed properties.

title: Add orgmap methods to WCTFClient
description: Add high-level methods to wctf_core/client.py: save_orgmap(), get_orgmap(). Delegate to operations/orgmap.py.

title: Add Pydantic models for roles (Role, WCTFAnalysis, CompanyRoles)
description: Add rich Pydantic models to wctf_core/models.py for role search: WCTFAnalysis, Role, PeakRoles, CompanyRoles. Include validators for orgmap references, helpers, and computed properties like is_mapped, is_analyzed.

title: Implement operations/roles.py with CRUD and orgmap integration
description: Create wctf_core/operations/roles.py with: save_roles(), get_roles(), add_role() (with deduplication), match_role_to_orgmap(), extract_org_signals(), update_orgmap_from_roles().

title: Implement operations/orgmap.py with basic CRUD operations
description: Create wctf_core/operations/orgmap.py with: save_orgmap(), get_orgmap(), update_peak(), add_rope_team(). Use YAML handler and path utilities, validate with Pydantic models.

title: Add role methods to WCTFClient
description: Add high-level methods to wctf_core/client.py: save_roles(), get_roles(), match_role_to_org(). Delegate to operations/roles.py.

title: Create /map-org slash command
description: Create .claude/commands/map-org.md that instructs LLM to use WebSearch/WebFetch to discover org structure, then call client.save_orgmap(). Include guidance on extracting leadership, coordination signals, insider connections.

title: Write design document to docs/plans/
description: Document complete design (schemas, workflows, SDK methods, Pydantic models) to docs/plans/2025-11-11-organizational-cartography-design.md for future reference.
